"Seasonal Events":
"\"Seasonal Events\" are special events that only last for a limited time.

During these events, the map and the appearance of some enemies will change."
"In addition, during this Seasonal Event, an unusual holographic symbol called a <yellow>\"Mischief Symbol\"<c> will appear somewhere in Central City."
"Also, during Seasonal Events, there will be additional Event-related <yellow>Daily/Weekly Tasks<c>."
